channel.title: Help!
channel.description: well im using silab client and have a silab server (funscap3) but when i try to use the ::pickup or the ::item command for an id above the 10.000 it says: [code]wrong syntax! use as ::pickup 0995 10[/code] so what do i need to do?

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:10, topic:171771”]you gotta type ::pickup 00995 2000000 not
::pickup 0995 2000000[/quote]
that is wrong… the pickup command should be ::pickup 0995 10
most ppl forget the first 0 and just do ::pickup 995 10…

if that doesnt work u need to edit ur pickup command as he said in the previous post.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:8, topic:171771”]if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } [/quote]
doesnt work…

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

danny06:

Look in the tutorial section for Tico’s How to add silabs, you’ll see a new pickup commands replace yours with that one.

one of them dont give me an error but when i try to spawn something it doesnt give me the right thing. can any 1 else help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

[quote=“madgamer, post:2, topic:171771”]edit the pickup command.

use this:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax. Try ::pickup ##### # "); } }[/quote]
doesnt work for me… any 1 got another one?

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

edit the pickup command.

use this:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax. Try ::pickup ##### # "); } }

Read full topic
